tool.help: The tool searches for the minimum variance within 16 directions and applies a Lee Filter in the direction of minimum variance. The filter is edge-preserving and can be used to remove speckle noise from SAR images or to smooth DTMs. Applied to DTMs, this filter will preserve slope breaks and narrow valleys.<br/>For more details, please refer to the references.
